sentences.en: Above the treeline take a grassy path leading steeply towards the summit.
sentences.cn: 过了林木线之后沿着长满青草的小道直通陡峭的顶.

sentences.en: Massive tractors and bulldozers are ripping into the treeline, toppling the huge trees.
sentences.cn: 巨型拖拉机和推土机正在切割树木线，巨大的树木被放倒。

sentences.en: Vegetation lines the slopes at lower elevations, but much of the land in this image lies above the treeline.
sentences.cn: 植被沿着山坡较低处生长，然而图中的大部分陆地位于林线以上。

trans.tran_cn: 林木线（山顶上树木生长的上限）
树木生长线（按海拔标示的树木生长上限）
